channel.title: ALLTOME* ! OMFG lol!
channel.description:
Can [b]Someone[/b] Please Make Me a [b]"Alltome"[/b] Command For [b]Me[/b] Please to Put In [b]My[/b] Client.
[b]It [/b]Will be Greatly [b]Appreciated[/b].

item.title: ALLTOME* ! OMFG lol!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

WINDOWS M£DIA:

lemme test.

Go ahead, I’ve used it many times and I assure you it works the same as yours, you’re just calling a new method which could be good in later situations, but there is not need for him…

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

It’s in the very beginning of the client.java, it calls everything.

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:11, topic:186143”][quote author=fr3sh_aka_clutch link=topic=248588.msg2086609#msg2086609 date=1204596545]
where is public class client extends Player implements Runnable {?
[/quote]

at the top of client.java, like 10 lines down or so[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 03:10:32 PM[/size][hr]fury wouldnt work in most because they aren’t declared.[/quote]

Wow, why don’t you just try it out? Perhaps I have memory lost or someone ghost came in and changed my codes but I’m sure they worked just yesterday.

[quote=“WINDOWS M£DIA, post:10, topic:186143”]in client.java

p.s. fury urs won’t work for me but it might be cause of my souce idk :)[/quote]

The source doesn’t matter.

Guys, you don’t need to declare, ANYTHING, you know why? Because all the needed things are declared ALREADY. And if you’re going to say what if you have a different source? Then too bad because his wouldn’t work either…

All the code says is to teleport all players to the spot that you are standing on, then send a global message saying you’ve been teleported to +playerName, all those are already declared by 99% of the servers, and if you are EVEN working on such a clean server without all these already declared, then you shouldn’t even be asking for this code because you should be an experienced coder which I’m sure fr3sh_aka_clutch isn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: ALLTOME* ! OMFG lol!
item.dc:creator: @WINDOWS_M_DIA WINDOWS M£DIA
item.description:
@WINDOWS_M_DIA wrote:

under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }

then search

master

and after the command well after the last }
add

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && playerRights == 3) { teleall(); }

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 03:06:12 PM[/size][hr]need a void fury lol

Read full topic

item.title: ALLTOME* ! OMFG lol!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xalltome") && playerRights >= 2){ for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client c = (client)p; c.teleportToX = absX; c.teleportToY = absY; c.updateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "You have been teleported to " +playerName+ "..."; } } }
